name: UTF-ANSI Translator
tagline: Vietnamese Diacritic Restoration System with Machine Learning
description: A comprehensive Vietnamese text processing system that converts between UTF-8 and ANSI encodings with intelligent diacritic restoration. Features a custom transformer model for Vietnamese accent prediction, microservice architecture, and a web-based interface for seamless text conversion and file processing.

responsibilities: Developed custom transformer model for Vietnamese diacritic restoration using PyTorch
Built dual-service architecture with Model Service and Web Interface components
Implemented comprehensive character mapping system for Vietnamese language processing
Created Flask web application with file upload and real-time text conversion
Developed automated startup scripts with batch files for Windows deployment

features: Custom transformer model with 528 Vietnamese accent classes for precise diacritic restoration
Bidirectional conversion between UTF-8 and ANSI encodings with character mapping
Microservice architecture with separate Model Service on port 5001 and Web Interface on port 5000
Web-based interface supporting both text input and file upload with download functionality
Comprehensive Vietnamese character mapping preserving text structure and formatting
Real-time text processing with GPU acceleration support for faster inference

metrics: Supports 528 distinct Vietnamese accent classification classes
Processes text files up to 5MB with preserved formatting and line breaks
Achieves high accuracy diacritic restoration using token classification approach
Handles complete Vietnamese character set including complex vowel combinations
Provides seamless conversion between UTF-8 and ANSI encoding standards
highlights: Successfully trained custom transformer model for Vietnamese language processing
Implemented robust microservice architecture with independent Model and Web services
Built comprehensive character mapping system covering all Vietnamese diacritics
Created user-friendly web interface with file processing capabilities
